titles: An answer to a booke entitvled An hvmble remonstrance in which the originall of liturgy, episcopacy is discussed : and quares propounded concerning both : the parity of bishops and presbyters in Scripture demonstrated : the occasion of their imparity in antiquity discovered : the disparity of the ancient and our moderne bishops manifested : the antiquity of ruling elders in the church vindicated : the prelaticall church bownded / written by Smectymnvvs.
author: Smectymnuus.
Milton, John, 1608-1674.
publisher: Printed for I. Rothwell and are to be sold by T.N. ...,
notes: Wing attributes authorship to Stephen Marshall, who with Edmund Calamy, Thomas Young, Matthew Newcomen and William Spurstowe, wrote under the pseudonym Smectymnuus.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656. --  Humble remonstrance to the high court of Parliament.
